QAs.question: Can more than one bulb be controlled together as a group lighting?
QAs.answer: Yes, you can control them from Wiz application on your mobile and once setup is done on your phone you can add your family members too so that they can also use it, they just need to download the application. You can simply create rooms just like we create a folder for files and add number of bulbs in that room and like wise other rooms as well in the house.You can also setup a timer for all these bulbs to Turn ON and Turn OFF automatically. Never turn of the bulbs directly from main power switch, just control it from the Wiz Application so that It can automatically turn On and Off as per timer.In case of power cut it automatically connects with App and WiFi. When power will restore it, you just have to turn the bulb off from App.see less

QAs.question: Hi so I have changed my wifi and the bulb is not reacting to that. It shows offline. I have tried to reset it and then connect but it does not repond.
QAs.answer: Steps to Fix it:-Step 1: Switch ON and OFF the bulb THREE times (Check The bulb is blinking Rapidly)Step 2: Open The AppStep 3: Remove the device from the listStep 4: Now try to Setup the bulbNOTE: If your WiFi is a 5g router, then it will not connect, because this bulb only supports 2.4 GHz wifi band. How to Claim the warranty when I bought a product from Amazon?
QAs.answer: Just go through the respected product description ..to claim warranty and u may contact for.the customer service to the particular concern....

QAs.question: How to get warranty on this bulb
QAs.answer: Ask Amazon customer care, when you get trouble. I had purchased one Philips inverter bulb with nice Carton packing. The inverter bulb was upto my thinking. Second one ordered, the same Philips Inverter bulb. The packing was worst, in a simple brown cover, the consequence was the cover of the bulb has come out & being an engineer assembled myself & used. Informed Amazon on such a worst packing on my second order. Informed Amazon, no reply from them. Ofcourse We can't expect for every item Amazon responsible. Both are Amazon certified source. Hope the second source they should have black listed due to bad packing remark, I suppose in the absence of reply to me. Don't expect any warranty help or bad packing help from Amazon. Trust Amazon do the work. Super senior citizen feedbacksee less

QAs.question: How do we know this inverter bulb get charge fully? in day time
QAs.answer: Trust the innovator, buy the bulb, switch ON for 8 to 10 hours &  follow the instructions. First purchased one, satisfied, second one also ordered & using. You don't try life cycle of the product. Use & enjoy the result. We love it. Replaced tubelights in Kitchen & dinning hall. Wonderful. Want to have one in drawing hall also. My findings in a methodical way as a super senior citizensee less

QAs.question: if the power will be cut the lamp is not working...Only 8months... Usages  I bought a two Philips reachable light..
QAs.answer: The bulb has overcharge protection as well deep discharge protection. It takes care of power supply. Only thing what I found was for balanced power supply failure, working is smooth. For unbalanced power supply failure, function is not that good, means it won't light up on Switched OFF to ON condition. This is due to some current in neutral line. This is common in India ie, unbalanced mode in power failure at times. We can't help. Such condition occurs, switch off main, bulb will work. Then restore main, when supply returns. Findings from super senior citizen engineersee less

QAs.question: What mean the recharge cycle
QAs.answer: Recharge cycle means charge / discharge cycle. I think they have given around 10000 cycle or more if I am correct. That's the quality test. It does not mean that it will fail. It is a result of sample test by supplier. Super senior citizen opinion

QAs.question: This bulb is giving light(ON) even when switch is turned down. Is there a way to exchange this?
QAs.answer: Once charged, use like a normal bulb. But daily you switch ON for a some minimum duration to get keep go on the benefit. That's why you should in places like kitchen or dining hall or Drawing hall where usage is there. If you want the bulb in other places, remove the charged bulb & used it wherever you want. Amazon is selling a holder special type, wherein the charged bulb can be plugged & without any wiring you can switch On the bulb with the knob provided on the special holder. It costs only Rs 69/-. I want to order. But Amazon try to levy delivery charges inspite of order value is more than Rs 500. Sad part from Amazon. This special holder is boon to inverter bulb for moveable wirless mode. Great innovation, but Amazon exploits for Rs 69 cost + delivery cost. Not Happy. They should sell with bulb as a packagesee less
